climatePledgeFriendly.details: Compact by Design (Certified by Amazon) products remove excess air and water, which reduces the carbon footprint of shipping and packaging.

features: GENTLE SALINE WIPES: Boogie Wipes saline nose wipes are wet wipes made with natural saline, which is gentle on skin, helps clean and dissolve snot and boogers, and wipes away dirt and germs They’re gentle enough to be used on noses, faces, fingers and toes whenever cleaning is necessary
SOFT & GENTLE: Soothe and moisturize with Aloe, Chamomile, and Vitamin E so wipes are extra soft, safe and gentle for all ages
MADE WITH NATURAL SALINE: Made with 09% isotonic saline, which is the same amount of saline that naturally occurs in the human body Hypoallergenic and free of alcohol, parabens, and phthalates
RESEALABLE PACK: Hard, flip-top lid is resealable and perfect for having fresh wipes handy every day or on stuffy noses when allergy, cold and flu symptoms are at their worst
INVENTED BY MOMS: Invented by moms for moms, and also recommended by pediatricians!
100% NATURAL FRAGRANCE: Fresh fragrance is made of 100% naturally-derived ingredients
body.description: Boogie Wipes saline nose wipes are made with a patented, non-medicated natural and sterile saline formula, which dissolves kids' dried boogers and helps provide relief during cold, flu and allergy seasons and everyday irritation. Recommended by parents and pediatricians alike, Boogie Wipes are a gentle, easy alternative to dry tissues and can soothe even the most tender and sensitive noses. Since they are made with natural saline, these wipes are great for all ages - from congested infants and newborns to stuffy toddlers, even grown adults! Saline is naturally occurring in the earth and body and pediatricians regularly recommend its use for breaking up and clearing out snot, so you can rest assured your child’s cold or congestion symptoms will be relieved. Boogie Wipes also soothe and moisturize skin and noses with Aloe, Chamomile, and Vitamin E. Simple, easy-to-use and made with fun, 100% natural fragrances, these kid-friendly wipes encourage kids to blow their own nose. Boogie Wipes products are safe for all ages, can be used as often as needed and were created by moms for moms. Made with love in the USA and manufactured by ELEEO BRANDS

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 26, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars They never fail
reviews.reviewText: When it’s the winter months and my kids start to get sick and get snotty noses, boggy wipes never fail to keep their noses clean and free of crusty boogers, without hurting their skin

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 11, 2011
reviews.reviewText: I was really skeptical that wipes specially made for noses would be worth the money, but they actually do work, magically, in fact. They're nice to have on hand for when kids' noses get crusty those certain times of year.

reviews.reviewText: Boogie Wipes Fresh Scent product is packed with a powerhouse of greatness.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 8, 2010
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A must have for the cold season!!!!
reviews.reviewText: I was givin a pack of these at Christmas for my six month old and I'm sure glad I was as he came down with a cold a few weeks later, it's now been a year and these are always on hand! I have tried the different scents and not only do I enjoy using them, my son never cries when I use them to clean his nose and I believe it's because they smell so good he actualy enjoys it!! The pack is a great size to carry easily and they are just fun to use! They also work too.. they are soft and dont irritate my son's skin like regular tissue does, makes a great baby shower gift!! here isnt a crusty boogie safe from these wipes!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 24, 2010
reviews.reviewText: I really like these. They are great for on the go, and much nicer to little noses than regular tissues. My only complaints are the size (I would love a smaller tissue size, and end up tearing them in half to work with my infants nose) and the price. They are bit on the expensive side, but I have now learned to buy in bulk!

Our granddaughter 18 mos, will let me clean anywhere on her face. They are soft, she loves the grape smell and taste and will wipe her own face and hands. Bonus is she cannot tear them into tiny pieces! They are great for after eating clean up.
